title: [K-12] E-learning Expert Course on Occupational Safety and Health for Migrant Workers

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental industrial health concepts and Korean communication skills
context.additional_context: Graduate-level professional education program linked to strengthening practical occupational health and safety competencies in multicultural environments

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify over 90% of the top 10 risk factors that may occur in the work environments of migrant workers.
Achieve over 85% application accuracy of core provisions of the Occupational Safety and Health Act based on real-world case studies
Successfully perform emergency response procedures three consecutive times using digital simulation tools
Write a project report that concretizes safety and health improvement plans through collaboration with multicultural team members
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
